name: Rumble On Ice
description:
Game created during the 2018 Creative Jam in partnership with NAD university. 

Rythm game where the crowd, divided in 2 teams, has to clap their hands and stomp their feets to match the music. 

The game is meant to be displayed on an official hockey rink to entertain the crowd during down time. 

Song used for prototype purpose only.
(Jet - Get what you need - 2003)

--- 
Designed by : 

Alexis Harvey
Eve Gaboury
Manuel Bergeron
